title: Best cars of the Toyko Motor Show, VW's new Golf 8 unveiled - Top motoring stories of the week
text:
Perhaps the biggest news of the week is that of Volkswagen unveiling the 8th-generation of the ever-popular Golf hatchback.

Take a trip down memory lane with five songs that are named after cars. The song Little Red Corvette by Prince is one, and Mustang Sally is still a firm favourite.

Top stories

Citroen officially made its return to the South African market earlier in September with a trio of new models. We take a look at what the real reason is behind the re-introduction.

READ | Out of warranty? These automatic 'transmission prices for new luxury sedans will make you cringe

Take a look at which Toyota Hilux bakkie between, the Legend 50 or GR Sport, is the one you would drive.

Duncan Alfreds takes a look at what to keep in mind when viewing a car advertisement, and how to look for potentially 'dodgy' ones.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: VW took the covers off its new 8th-generation Golf and we take a look at how much it costs to replace a brand new automatic transmission. Here are the top motoring stories of the week.
